"Gangs, wars, truces. Nothing I didn't already know."

- Tommy Shelby, on the topic of entering politics. 


In the history of war, armed conflict and empire building, the line between enemy and ally has often been blurred or redefined, thus the name of this site. 

This site is part blog and part project organiser.
